org.openpnp.machine.reference.camera
Class AbstractCamera

java.lang.Object
  org.openpnp.machine.reference.camera.AbstractCamera
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReferenceCamera, Camera
Direct Known Subclasses:
FakeCamera, LtiCivilCamera, SimulatorCamera, VfwCamera
public abstract class AbstractCamera
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReferenceCamera

Provides listener support for Camera subclasses along with the basic implementation of the Camera interface. TODO It's possible that all this stuff should just be in ReferenceCamera.

getUnitsPerPixel

public Location getUnitsPerPixel()
Description copied from interface: Camera
The number of X and Y units per pixel this camera shows when in perfect focus. Location isn't a great datatype for this, but it gets the job done.

public void startContinuousCapture(CameraListener listener,
                                   int maximumFps)
Description copied from interface: Camera
Registers a listener to receive continuous images from the camera at a rate less than or equal to maximumFps images per second.

Specified by:

stopContinuousCapture

public void stopContinuousCapture(CameraListener listener)
Description copied from interface: Camera
Requests that the continuous capture be stopped for the previously registered listener. If the Camera has other listeners they should still receive updates.

Specified by:
stopContinuousCapture in interface Camera
